summary: This header file defines user-configurable variables and security parameters for the suexec wrapper code in Apache HTTP Server. It specifies constraints like minimum allowed UIDs/GIDs, allowable execution paths, and logging configuration, providing the foundation for secure execution of CGI programs under different user IDs.

logs.reason: This file only defines the log file path and configuration parameters for the suexec module. The actual log messages would be in the implementation (.c) files.
logs.resolution: If you're seeing issues related to suexec, check the log file defined at AP_LOG_EXEC and ensure the configuration values in this header match your system's requirements.
